price: 22. Mpe soki bapengwi babundisi bino, bakokima bango moko mpe bakozua lisungi te mpe mobateli te.
arabic: وَلَوۡ قَٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوَلَّوُاْ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaw qātalakumu alladhīna kafarū lawallawū al-adbāra thumma lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
